text: In exchange for his sister, Viserys was given ______.
Despite his best efforts, King Robert filled his reign with ______.
______ was proclaimed the true king of the Seven Kingdoms.
In ______, you win or you lose.
There is no word for ______ in Dothraki.
A Dothraki wedding without ______ is considered a dull affair.
After I was caught ______, I was forced to join the Night's Watch.
A man without ______ is a man without power.
